svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Children who experience violent discipline vs GDP per capita
The vertical axis shows the percentage of children 2–14 years old who, according to self-reports by caregivers or
other household members, experienced any violent discipline at home in the past month (including psychological
aggression and/or physical punishment). In some instances observations refer to only part of a country (see sources
for more details). The horizontal axis shows GDP per capita after adjusting for inflation and price differences between
Percentage of children (2–14) who experience any violent
Source: Violent Discipline - UNICEF Global Databases (2016), World Bank
